posts.post_content:
Price is firm and includes delivery; standard paypal payment is preferred.   

Each card in this lot features the same small purple owner stamp (stylized J?), and some additionally exhibit pencil markings on the back.  All have rounded corners and most are crease free.  See additional description of each below: 
Frank Arellanes - no creases
Beals Becker - no creases
Bill Bradley (Portrait) - top right corner wrinkle
Bill Carrigan - scraping at bottom front
Cecil Ferguson - no creases
Topsy Hartsel - no creases
Paddy Livingstone - no creases
George Perring - bottom right corner crease
Germany Schaefer (Detroit) - no creases
Oscar Stanage - no creases; bottom edge may be trimmed
Charlie Starr - no creases
Jesse Tannehill - bottom left corner wrinkle
Bob Unglaub - no creases

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/marksF/web.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/marksB/web.jpg[/IMG]
